name: Counter-Gaslighting Strategies
description: Advanced techniques for turning gaslighting back onto the manipulator.

cards.title: Reverse Questioning
cards.description: Forcing gaslighters to expose their own contradictions.
bulletpoints: Using precise questioning to make them defend their distortions.
Exposing logical fallacies to break their control.
cards.summaryText: Aim laser-focused questions at their lies, peel back the logic until it collapses, and steer the exchange into traps where they confess through contradiction.

cards.title: Narrative Control Reversal
cards.description: Flipping the gaslighting attempt by shifting the narrative.
bulletpoints: Reframing their manipulation as proof of their own insecurity.
Using humor and exaggeration to neutralize gaslighting attacks.
Acting confused on purpose to break their strategic rhythm.
cards.summaryText: Flip the script so their attack screams insecurity, deflate it with exaggerated humor, and feign confusion to throw their pacing into chaos.

cards.title: Strategic Disengagement
cards.description: Withdrawing from gaslighting scenarios before they escalate.
bulletpoints: Recognizing when to disengage instead of fighting.
Using silence and non-reaction to frustrate manipulators.
Leaving conversations without justifying your departure.
cards.summaryText: Spot the moment the game isnâ€™t worth playing, give them nothing but silence, and walk away without offering explanations they can weaponize.
